definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

sentences.english: Let’s take a look at a few of the non-electronic predecessors to today’s silicon circuits.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們來看看今天硅電路的非電子前輩。

sentences.english: The grand old man was not convinced.
sentences.chinese: 然而那位老前輩並未信服。

sentences.english: The Aztecs, Maya, And Their Predecessors, 4Th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 阿茲特克人，瑪雅人和他們的前輩，第4版。

sentences.english: So a lot of Zhejiang and produced poor quality products enter the market.
sentences.chinese: 於是多量浙江一帶產的劣質產品首進步前輩入市場。

sentences.english: So let me offer a few words of wisdom, things I learned from my mentors.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏我要談一談我從我的前輩學來的經驗和智慧。

sentences.english: Like its predecessor, this transformation can be extended.
sentences.chinese: 像其前輩一樣，該轉換可以擴展。

sentences.english: Like many others before me, I have experienced "intimations of immortality."
sentences.chinese: 像許多我的前輩一樣，我經歷過過“不朽的暗示”。

sentences.english: Have someone taken part in the CET oral English Test , could you please give us some advise?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有參加過四級口語考試的前輩給咱們傳傳經呀？

sentences.english: Old scholars FANG Xin-fang et al had classified rhizopus into"Shanghai rhizopus"and"Chuanqian rhizopus".
sentences.chinese: 方心芳等老前輩將根黴分爲“上海型”和“川黔型”。

sentences.english: Like its predecessor, Kentucky Fried Chicken has its own secret recipe.
sentences.chinese: 和它的前輩一樣，肯德基烤雞肉也有自己的祕方。

sentences.english: And ChengYi aspects also have no confidence for the hearing, then to predecessors Xiao Yongguang for help.
sentences.chinese: 而承義方面亦對聆訊毫無信心，便向前輩蕭永光求助。

sentences.english: Today the opening of a new house, all predecessors of the exhibitions…
sentences.chinese: 今天小屋新開張，請各位前輩們多多指教了。

sentences.english: After a few days, the old-timer greeted the kids again, but this time he had a sad smile on his face.
sentences.chinese: 幾天後，這個老前輩再一次招呼住那些孩子。

sentences.english: Lenard Wilkins, an elder member of the city council was also in attendance.
sentences.chinese: 參與狗肉美食節的一位市議會的前輩級人物。

sentences.english: But Stringer, and his predecessors, have been making that same promise for years.
sentences.chinese: 但是縱梁和他的前輩，做同樣諾言多年來。

definition: senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
senior female fellow student or apprentice/daughter (older than oneself) of one's teacher
used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
